classData.comment:
/**
 * Shared service for managing, listing, calling, and validating MCP tools.
 * Can be instantiated by both MCP Servers (with OpenAPI spec) and MCP Clients.
 *
 * @class Neo.ai.mcp.ToolService_tmp
 * @extends Neo.core.Base
 */
classData.description: Shared service for managing, listing, calling, and validating MCP tools. Can be instantiated by both MCP Servers (with OpenAPI spec) and MCP Clients.
classData.name: ToolService_tmp

classData.comment:
/**
         * Path to the OpenAPI specification file.
         * @member {String|null} openApiFilePath=null
         */
classData.name: openApiFilePath

classData.comment:
/**
     * Internal cache for tools formatted for the MCP 'tools/list' response.
     * @member {Array|null} allToolsForListing=null
     * @protected
     */
classData.description: Internal cache for tools formatted for the MCP 'tools/list' response.
classData.name: allToolsForListing

classData.comment:
/**
     * Map of service method handlers.
     * Only getting set for MCP servers.
     * @member {Object|null} serviceMapping=null
     */
classData.description: Map of service method handlers. Only getting set for MCP servers.
classData.name: serviceMapping

classData.comment:
/**
     * Internal cache for parsed tool definitions.
     * @member {Object|null} toolMapping=null
     * @protected
     */
classData.name: toolMapping

classData.description: Executes a specific tool with the given arguments.
classData.name: callTool

classData.comment:
/**
     * Initializes the internal tool mapping and the list of tools.
     * Designed to be called lazily.
     */
classData.description: Initializes the internal tool mapping and the list of tools. Designed to be called lazily.
classData.name: initializeToolMapping

classData.comment:
/**
     * Provides a paginated list of available tools.
     * @param {Object} [options]
     * @param {Number} [options.cursor=0]
     * @param {Number} [options.limit]
     * @returns {Object}
     */
classData.description: Provides a paginated list of available tools.
classData.name: listTools

classData.comment:
/**
     * Validates a value against a JSON Schema subset.
     * @param {*}      value
     * @param {Object} schema
     * @param {String} [path='args']
     * @returns {Boolean}
     */
classData.description: Validates a value against a JSON Schema subset.
classData.name: validateJsonSchema

classData.comment:
/**
     * Validates tool input against the internal Zod schema (if available) or a provided JSON Schema.
     * @param {String} toolName
     * @param {Object} args
     * @param {Object} [schema]
     * @returns {boolean}
     */
classData.description: Validates tool input against the internal Zod schema (if available) or a provided JSON Schema.
classData.name: validateToolInput
